typedef APS_RequestKeyStatus_t APS_RkrStatus_t

This type is deprecated and will be removed.

Definition at line 69 of file apsmeRequestKey.h.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum APS_RequestKeyType_t

The APSME provides services that allow a device to request the active network key or a master key from another device (for example, its Trust Center). See ZigBee Specification r19, 4.4.6, page 465. The type of key being requested:

  • Network (0x01) and Application (0x02) key,
  • Trust Center Link Key (0x04 - it's not supported),
  • 0x00 and 0x03-0xFF = Reserved.

Definition at line 44 of file apsmeRequestKey.h.

enum APS_RequestKeyStatus_t

Status of creating and sending a request key command frame.

Definition at line 52 of file apsmeRequestKey.h.

Function Documentation

void APS_RequestKeyInd ( APS_RequestKeyInd_t *  indParams)

Generate this primitive when APS receives a request-key command frame.

Upon receipt of the APSME-REQUEST-KEY.indication primitive, the ZDO shall be informed that the device referenced by the SrcAddress parameter is requesting a key. See ZigBee Specification r19, 4.4.6.2, page 466.

Parameters:
[in]indParams- pointer to APSME-REQUEST-KEY.indication's parameters.
See also:
APS_RequestKeyInd_t
Returns:
None.
